name: Cruelty
summary: The harm you deal with your corrupting touch saps the strength from your enemy's body.
description:
The harm you deal with your corrupting touch saps the strength from your enemy's body. If your next action is to cast touch of corruption on a living creature, the target is also enfeebled 1 for 1 minute if it fails its save (enfeebled 2 if it critically fails).Cruelty Leads To...

If you use any action (including free actions and reactions) other than Cast a Spell directly after, you waste the benefits of the metamagic action.
